original_text: Now some cried out one thing, some another, for the assembly was in confusion, and most of them did not know why they had come together.
korean_text: 사람들이 외쳐 어떤 이는 이런 말을, 어떤 이는 저런 말을 하니 모인 무리가 분란하여 태반이나 어찌하여 모였는지 알지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: Now some cried out one thing,
sentences.korean_translation: 이에 어떤 사람들은 한 가지를 외치고,

sentences.original_text: for the assembly was in confusion,
and most of them did not know
